name: Steventon Street Demo
description:
Steventon Street is an otome dating sim in which you play as a woman who opens a bookstore in the fictional town of Peabody, Maryland. But nothing's ever simple for this Janeite, and she suddenly finds herself surrounded by new faces, as well as a few old ones.
Each romantic storyline is a loose adaptation of one of Jane Austen's six novels.

The demo covers the first two months of the main character's life on Steventon Street, and is around 20,000 words long.

Features:

  • Six love interests (five male, one female)
  • Customizable main character
  • Partial voice acting
